name: 魔法猫ミッカ~! Magical Cat Mikka and The Fallen Star Kingdom
name_original: 魔法猫ミッカ~! Magical Cat Mikka and The Fallen Star Kingdom
description:
Synopsis:

魔法猫ミッカ~! is an RPG maker shooter game where you play as a cat who likes to shoot and scratch at bad evil monsters!

Story:

The world is a beautiful place where people live in peace and harmony.

....Until their dimension collided with another one! When this happens, natural disasters and various oddities will soon follow!

Luckily, we have Mikka, an ordinary housecat who turned out to be not-so-ordinary in these strange times. With the power of the great magician, she transforms into a human with super magical abilities!

This time her quest is to battle the inhabitants from the distant dimension. These are like humans, but their body is composed entirely out of solid materials such as stone, silver, gold or even diamond!

Will she be able to complete her quest? You, the player, will be the one who decides that!

Mechanics :

Battle - This game uses an 'ABS' or 'Action Battle System' where you fight enemies in real-time.  You can shoot an unlimited amount of magical projectile, use claws to attack enemies, and consume an item to perform a special ability.

Perks - When you level up to a certain point, you will be able to get a 'perk'. Each perk is unique and has its own uses, be it offensively or defensively.

Ranking - Each time you cleared a dungeon, you will be scored and ranked based on your performance. You get points when you defeat enemies, but lose them when you get hit or take too long.

Controls :

Arrow Keys - Movement 

Shift - Run

X - Menu

Crtl - Direction fix

A - Aim

S - Use claws (Not usable until a certain point)

C - Use special abilities

Z - Interact, attack          

Note: Still a WIP. Please expect some bugs! Also, this is my first game ever released, so I'd appreciate it if you could review it and give me some feedback so I can improve the game in the next version.

(For those who made it to the dev room, please use the gravel between a dog and a green-haired lady to save)

Current version : 0.1 

Average Playtime: 1-2 hours

Only prologue and chapter 1 is available so far

Known Bugs

-'Attack! Attack! Attack!' perk doesn't work properly, as it will actually reduce your damage. 

-Mana orb might randomly disappear after using 'heal' option at the perk crystal.
